abstracts.cdata!:
The Elbistan Operation and Maintenance
            Assistance Project will provide for the Bank's
            continued presence in a key thermal power project in Turkey.
            The main objective of the project will be to help finance
            the completion of Units 3 and 4 at the Elbistan power
            station and to ensure the station's adequate operating
            availability and efficient operation.
